website_summaries.verdict: Battery is not only highly functional but it also comes at a great value, especially when purchased as a 2-pack.
pros: 12V, pod-style battery charges quickly and holds a charge for extended period of time
Reliable model that is compatible with Makita 1222, 1233, 1200, 1220, 1234, 1235, 192598-2, and 192681-5
cons: After repeated use, doesn't hold a charge as long as it did at first

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a few months.  Now failing.  Not as good as Makita quality
customer_reviews.text: So now within 1 year this battery pack is failing much sooner than the original Makita battery packs that lasted almost a decade. Typical Chinese quality - mea culpa. And now I see they have raised the price of these packs by 50%! COURAGE! Do not bother with these scammers. These are seriously inferior batteries that will fail within a year -- now at 50% higher price!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It also was also no good after running in 9 screws
customer_reviews.text: I fully charged it upon receipt. It managed to run in 6 screws. I recharged it, giving it a second chance. It ran in 6 screws and was dead again so I returned it and purchased a 3.0Ah from same supplier. It also was also no good after running in 9 screws. Since Makita has made these obsolete, I suspect there are no good replacements. I ordered a similar one a year ago and it charged and was trash after about 4 recharges.
customer_reviews.author: cremus

customer_reviews.title: Maybe good,maybe not
customer_reviews.text: The last version of this battery that I bought punked out in very short time. I’ll have to see what it gives me this time. The problem with all battery stuff is that longevity is never guaranteed.. It should be and not pro-rated either.
customer_reviews.author: J. Farrell

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The battery arrived quickly. Works in my drill, chargers in my charger. So it's great so far. Haven't needed to use it enough to run it down, so I don't know how it holds a charge, etc. I'll report back if there are problems but I think it's going to be great.
customer_reviews.author: David Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great find and has given new life to ourita drill nowvthst the battery packs that came with it have died. The product arrived on time and is terrific, reliable and charges up the drill quickly. Holds the charge a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This fixed my makita impact wrench. Thought the wrench was dead, just the old batteries instead. Dont know how long this battery will last, but seems to be just fine for my "homeowner Freddy" duty cycle. Will purchase another one
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great Battery at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: So far has been great. Need time to determine endurance of battery pack.
customer_reviews.author: Eastlake

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted about 15 months of light use (a few dozen charge/discharges).
customer_reviews.author: jjjetplane

customer_reviews.title: correct
customer_reviews.text: It charged and holds a charge long term woks as good as the original Thank You
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good replacement for older tools.
customer_reviews.text: This replacement battery works well with my older Makita tools. It is cheaper than buying new tools.
customer_reviews.author: Michael T Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: beter then the ones that came with the drill
customer_reviews.text: I'm only giving it 4 stars because I have had it only a week now and have only recharged it a couple of times. it has plenty of power . I mite buy second I like it so much .
customer_reviews.author: Highlander

customer_reviews.title: Charged and ready!
customer_reviews.text: This battery charged up super quick and so grateful we don't have to purchase a new drill. Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Aurelia

customer_reviews.title: Not able to charge
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t charge. Worked for the first use and then didn’t work again.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Winterton

customer_reviews.title: My drill was made new again for a great price! It also fits into place better than the original!
customer_reviews.text: I’m short on time because I’m busy drilling again, so just get it. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: R. Morey

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Does not hold a charge very long
customer_reviews.text: Good price. Does not hold a charge very long. Works ok.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great deal.
customer_reviews.text: Works just as well as a new drill. Great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Jfall

customer_reviews.title: Perfect battery as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product!! Came fully charged too. Holds its charge for a long time and is as good as any battery I've had.
customer_reviews.author: jeremy johnston

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once or twice so far, but it works and holds a charge much better than what I replace.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and I would say this is a good
customer_reviews.text: Still working off first charge, and I would say this is a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: Fits my old Makita. It revived an old tool ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits my old Makita. It revived an old tool to its former glory.
customer_reviews.author: Henri

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Both batteries charged fully and quickly and they certainly fit the Makita drill perfectly. What remains to be seen is how long they last (years) and what the run time is for a typical job of drilling and driving screws which obviously cannot be answered for some time.
customer_reviews.author: tennisguy

customer_reviews.title: No Notable Difference to OEM Battery
customer_reviews.text: Slide-in after market replacement battery for my Makita cordless. It fit OEM charger, charged quickly. I can see no notable difference between this and my OEM batteries, except for color. Not much more I can say without opening both the Poweraxis and Makita brand batteries up and comparing their innards. From the feel of it, look of it, and judging from its performance, it seems just like the original. I can't comment on longevity because I've only had this for about a week. Note: Sample provided for review.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable price
customer_reviews.text: Great price. Works great so far. Will update ratings in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: ccrider

product_meta.title: POWERAXIS 1222 12V 2.0Ah Replacement Battery for Makita 1222, 1233, 1234, PA12, 1220, 1235, 1235B, 1235F, 192696-2, 192698-8, 192698-A, 193138-9, 193157-5 Cordless Power Tool(Red)
feature_bullets: 【Battery Parameter】Battery Type: Brand New | Battery Type: Ni-CD | Voltage: 12V | Capacity: 2.0Ah (24Wh) | No Fake High Lable Capacity.
【Replacement Battery for Makita】Ideal Replacement Battery for Makita 1220 1222 1233 1200 1234 1235 1235B 1235F 192696-2 192698-8 192681-5 192598-2 193138-9, etc.

【Compatible with Makita 12V Power Tools】Fully Compatible with Makita 6213d, 6217d, 6270d, 6227d, 6312d, 6313d, 6916d, 1050d, 5093d, 6914d tools and more. 100% compatible with original cordless tools and chargers.

【Multiple Protections】Our 1222 replacement batteries are FCC, ROHS, CE certified, Built-in Protection against overcharging, over discharge, over current, provides short circuit protection and steady voltage circuit. No memory effect, Can be charged or discharged as needed without loss of capacity.

【Product Guarantee】We offer the best service and excellent products at fair prices with a 30 day money back guarantee and a one year warranty. Any question with the product, please feel free to contact us,we are happy to help.
